Name: El Luchador
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. *Special ingredient #1 : Thyme syrup made infusing 20-30g fresh thyme with 1 litre hot water for around 10 mins, then mixed with 1 kg white sugar.
Review: Thyme and Fernet Branca add herbal and medicinal notes this this long, cleansing cocktail.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Matías Iriarte, Ginbo Group, Palma de Mallorca, Spain. Inspiration : “The history of Don Facundo Bacardí and my own history have much in common; we have both had to fight for our dreams. My story is about a man who crossed the Atlantic in turbulent times and went to look for a better life, started from scratch on a paradise island, fell in love with a wonderful woman, founded his company and struggled to achieve his dream. “El Luchador means ‘the fighter’ - Don Facundo left us his legacy, and now I'm building mine - let's toast the fighters!”
Nutrition: One serving of El Luchador contains 116 calories
